meanings.definition: A person who improvises, especially a performer who improvises verse or music.
meanings.sent1: The improvisatori captivated the audience with their spontaneous poetry.
meanings.sent2: The improvisatori at the jazz club amazed everyone with their on-the-spot compositions.
meanings.sent3: The improvisatori decided to create a rap battle on the spot, much to the delight of the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The improvisatori's ability to create beautiful melodies out of thin air was truly magical.
meanings.sent5: Watching the improvisatori weave stories through music was like witnessing a wizard at work.
